title: Next hextech skin??
body: I've recently gotten 10 gemstones (hallelujah) but i dont really like any of the current hextexh skins, Since then i've wondered when the next hextexh skin would comke around. Anyone have an idea of when?

Xayahs never gotten a skin after base.

Ah I agree, I think both of those need a skin for sure but it might feel kind of bad if their next ones went into Hextech, mostly because they don't have a ton of skins between them (Kalista does have 3 but one is legacy)

wait, what is wrong with a champ getting a hextech skin? All of the hextech skins I know have always been available via the store. Hextech Janna, Hextech Galio, Hextech Anivia, etc. What would make this one any different?
Hextech as in Hextech Crafting :P only being able to craft it via gemstones or super rare drop
I see, so we're not talking about the skin itself being of the hextech design, but instead a skin of any design being available via hextech crafting?
Yep! Like Soulstealer Vayne and Lancer Zero Hecarim
